thread.title: Did Chrissy Teigen fall asleep at the Oscars?
thread.title_full: Did Chrissy Teigen fall asleep at the Oscars?

author: Katie Jones
title: Did Chrissy Teigen fall asleep at the Oscars?
text:
Chrissy Teigen got the internet talking at the Oscars this year, and not just because she looked incredible in her white Zuhair Murad gown. Advertisement - Continue Reading Below Towards the very end of the lengthy ceremony, when the Best Actor and Actress awards were being announced, the model was caught resting her head on her husband John Legend's shoulder. Her eyes were shut, and yes, Twitter jumped to conclusions.
CHRISSY TEIGEN ASLEEP ON JOHN LEGENDS SHOULDER IS ME RIGHT NOW
â€” lamb (@lilbuzzcut) February 27, 2017
